projects.name: AUTOGRADER ONLINE JUDGE
projects.description: In production evaluated 50k+ codes  Built a platform that remotely compiles user submitted code for a programming problem, automatically grades the code as per efficiency & correctness.  Adopted at University, used by teachers to train 1k+ students.  Supports horizontal scaling, deployed on gunicorn + nginx combination.

projects.name: SCALABILITY-4-ALL
projects.description: Founded Opensource Org Ongoing project to build an open source enterprise-scale chatbot.  Our organization got selected for prestigious RGSoC (Rails Girls Summer of Code) and we mentored 3 students under the programme.  We aim to build a marketplace of modules that powers chatbot so unlike traditional model enterprises do not have to share data to 3rd party or use APIs.

projects.name: KAGGLE | Dog Breed Identification Challenge
projects.description: Ranked 8th out of 965 contestants Challenge was to classify breed of given dog image in one of 120 breeds with mere 80 training images provided per class. Trained 2 fully connected layer in CNN combining it with pre-trained Inception V3 model using Transfer Learning. Applied conditional Laplace smoothing to optimize multi-log loss to get accuracy of 98.7%. Ranked in top 10 out of 965 Kaggle participants at the time of submission. Drawing insights from over 10 Kaggle contests, I have compiled my experience in my blog Introduction to Competitive Machine Learning.

experiences.description: Worked on improvising profits using statistical learning to improve best split across existing mathematical models by 140% than baseline system. Encapsulated my work as a machine learning library which is now being extended to more markets.

Our platform connected high-school students to relevant university students for counseling and creating personalized learning paths.  Experience of building a fleet of around 200 counselors working for us.  Guided couple of interns and worked closely in a team of 6.  Joy of helping 5000+ students till date.

Got invited directly to onsite interviews after winning top 3 cash prize in National ACM-ICPC Training camp during my high school. Tasks accomplished :- Built Machine Learning models : Problem Recommendation System.  Algorithmic Problem Curation.  Became youngest Directi Intern at age 17.
